title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When opening a Java editor in Photon and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu appears to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: When opening a Java editor in Photon and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor in Photon. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks should appear, but it does not.
